Hi Brendan,

Thank you for trusting us—really appreciate it.

I checked in with Tidio support, and here’s how you can update the domain display on your end:
  • Head to Settings in your Tidio panel
  • Go to Project and Billing
  • Click on Preferences
  • Update it with your correct '.com.au' domain

Just a quick note: this only changes the domain shown in emails sent from Tidio to your visitors. It won’t affect the live site where Tidio is installed.

Let me know how you go with that, I’m here if you need a hand!

Hey Brendan,

Great question and thank you so much for looping us in.

I’d love to recommend Tidio. It’s simple, lightweight, and really easy to manage day to day. We’ve seen it work well for teams who want to stay responsive without overcomplicating things.

Here’s a quick video that gives a nice overview if you’d like to explore it a bit more: Tidio Chatbot Overview.

Let me know if you’d like us to go ahead and get it set up on your site, we’re happy to take care of it.

Over the first 2 is there one you would recommend?

The livechat is 2x the price of the tidio chat...



Brendan McGovern

Clinic Director, Principal Physiotherapist

BSc Human Kinetics / MSc Physiotherapy

P | 02 8021 2180 F | 02 4044 0265

A | 73 Mullens Street, Balmain NSW 2041

Book Appointment Online



In clinic Tuesdays to Saturdays

Hi Brendan,

Thank you so much for letting us know.

Here are a few chatbot options we’d recommend:

  • Tidio - Super simple to set up on WordPress. It allows patients to leave a message, and your team can reply via the Tidio dashboard or mobile app. You’ll also get email alerts when someone reaches out.
  • ChatBot by LiveChat - A more advanced option with automation workflows, and it offers HIPAA-compliant plans if needed.
  • ManyChat - Great for Facebook Messenger automation and basic lead capture, though just a note: it’s not HIPAA-compliant.

If you’re just looking for something easy that lets patients get in touch and gives you time to reply when you’re ready, Tidio’s a great fit.

Let us know which direction you'd like to take and we're happy to handle setup or any customization needed on our end.
